statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); out=$(printf '\033[2m\033[32m%s@%s\033[0m' "$user" "$host"); out="$out $(printf '\033[2m\033[36m%s\033[0m' "$(basename "$dir")")"​; if cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && branch=$(git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null) && [ -n "$branch" ]; then out="$out $(printf '\033[2m\033[35mon %s\033[0m' "$branch")"​; status=$(git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$status" ] && ind="" && [ $(echo "$status" | grep -c '^ M' || echo 0) -gt 0 ] && ind="${ind}!" && [ $(echo "$status" | grep -c '^??' || echo 0) -gt 0 ] && ind="${ind}?" && [ $(echo "$status" | grep -c '^ D' || echo 0) -gt 0 ] && ind="${ind}✘" && [ -n "$ind" ] && out="$out $(printf '\033[2m\033[31m[%s]\033[0m' "$ind")"; fi; out="$out $(printf '\033[2m\033[34mvia %s\033[0m' "$model")"; echo "$out"
